After recently providing data from a variety of climate change scenario projections to inform the United Nations Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Sixth Assessment Report (AR6), ESGF will be re-architected to improve its reliability, scalability, and usability for new generations of high resolution global Earth system model outputs from dozens of international modeling centers.
